thread.title: Women Should Just Shut Up About Unequal Pay And Make Some Sandwiches
thread.title_full: Women Should Just Shut Up About Unequal Pay And Make Some Sandwiches

author: Susie Madrak
title: Women Should Just Shut Up About Unequal Pay And Make Some Sandwiches
text:
sharethis 10/07/15 1:00pm Listened to this, this morning, as I was driving to work. The law forces employers who pay more to a man working the same job as a woman to prove that the pay is based on elements other than gender. It also changes the rules on whether and when employees can sue employers regarding pay issues,â€¦ Aileen Rizo , Equal pay for equal work , John Hockenberry Comments
